summary: This is a forwarded email from attorney Sigrid McCawley to an unnamed recipient, introducing an Epstein victim who wishes to attend a victims' meeting in New York on October 23, 2019, and requesting assistance with travel arrangements and notifications.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.context: Partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP who is forwarding an email to arrange for an Epstein victim to attend a meeting in New York and receive travel assistance.

events.title: Epstein Victims Meeting in New York
events.description: A meeting for Epstein victims is scheduled to take place in New York.

locations: 401 E. Las Olas Blvd. Suite 1200 Fort Lauderdale, FL, 33301
keyFacts: An Epstein victim, whose name is redacted, is seeking to attend a victims' meeting in New York on October 23, 2019.
The victim requires travel assistance to attend the meeting, indicating she may be living outside the New York area.
Attorney Sigrid McCawley is facilitating communication and arrangements for the victim to ensure she is notified and can attend.
The email is marked as confidential and subject to attorney-client privilege, highlighting the sensitive nature of victim communications.
